ABOUT.TITLE: Who I Am
ABOUT.INTRO: Hi, I’m Marc. I’m passionate about turning ideas into interactive digital experiences. Coding gives me the freedom to build, explore, and improve — one line at a time.
ABOUT.LOCATION: I am based in Duisburg. Here, I work on personal and collaborative projects that challenge me to grow every day.
ABOUT.OPEN_MINDED: I’m open-minded and enthusiastic about learning new technologies. Whether it’s a new framework, design trend, or performance tweak — I’m always curious and committed to sharpening my skills.
ABOUT.PROBLEM_SOLVER: Problem-solving is where I thrive. I approach challenges with creativity, persistence, and a collaborative mindset. I believe great solutions come from asking the right questions and building on every failure.

DESCRIPTION.PART1: I have experience working with a range of front-end technologies, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks like Angular and Bootstrap. I enjoy building responsive, user-friendly interfaces that combine clean code with strong design principles.
DESCRIPTION.PART2: I’m always open to learning new tools and approaches — whether it’s a modern framework, a new build process, or best practices in UX. For me, staying up to date with the rapid evolution of web development isn’t just important — it’s essential. I see change as an opportunity to grow and improve with every project.

PORTFOLIO.TITLE: Featured Projects
PORTFOLIO.DESCRIPTION: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

CONTACT.TITLE: Get in Touch
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: If you want to collaborate or have any questions, feel free to reach out!

LEGAL.TITLE: Legal Notice
LEGAL.RESPONSIBLE_TITLE: Responsible for content according to § 55 Abs. 2 RStV
LEGAL.DISCLAIMER_TEXT: The content of this website was created with great care. However, I cannot guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of the content.
LEGAL.LINKS_TEXT: This website contains links to external websites of third parties. I have no influence over the content of those websites. The respective provider or operator of the sites is always responsible for the content of the linked sites.
LEGAL.COPYRIGHT_TEXT: All content and works created by the site operator are subject to German copyright law. Any duplication, processing, distribution, or any kind of use beyond the scope of copyright law requires the written consent of the respective author or creator.

PRIVACY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY.INTRO: We are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information.
PRIVACY.SECTION1_TEXT: We only collect personal data that you voluntarily provide through our contact form, including your name, email address, and message content.
PRIVACY.SECTION2_TEXT: Your data is used solely to respond to your inquiries and to provide the services you request. We do not sell or share your data with third parties.
PRIVACY.SECTION3_TEXT: All submitted information is stored securely and deleted once it is no longer needed for its intended purpose.
PRIVACY.SECTION4_TEXT: Our website does not use cookies or tracking tools. Your visit is anonymous and is not monitored.
PRIVACY.SECTION5_TEXT: You have the right to request access to your stored data, to correct or delete it, and to withdraw your consent at any time. To do so, please contact us directly.
PRIVACY.SECTION6_TEXT: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or your data, please reach out via our contact form or send us an email at
PRIVACY.SECTION7_TEXT: We reserve the right to update this privacy policy to comply with legal requirements or improve clarity. The most recent version will always be published on this page.
